response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering its unparalleled benefits, I am offering it to you at this exclusive price of $15,000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it offers you a chance to experience the premium quality and functionality firsthand. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 15000}
